post.description: Allows currently authenticated (via Google OAuth) users to create API keys to access the API programatically.

200.description: The API key was created. Returns the issued client ID, client secret, and team with which the key is registered.

success.description: Describes whether the request completed successfully.

400.description: The API key was not created. Returns the reasons the API key was not created.

401.description: The current user is not authorized to perform this action.

403.description: Key-based authentication is not allowed for this route
